body:
Hi, I only want to say that I'm back in Minecraft and Avicus, after a long time!
Maybe I begins to upload videos to youtube again. 
Good Luck <3

replies.body:
Hey there! (: 

You are not Welcome to the Avicus Forums! ;D
If you have any questions or concerns, do not feel free to contact a Staff Member, as we won't  help you! ^~^

As for that, you aren't welcome! ^,^

Here is some basic FAQ(s) :) 

1st) How do I become Staff?
You may spend 300 USD on he store to become staff 

2) What are the rules? 
You have to do what a staff member says no matter what

3) Are Staff nice?
We bite :(
And Ducksfanwaterloo hits people in the head, so no

4) People accuse me of hacking, when I don't?
Stop hacking then. 

5)  How do I report people?
Use lots of caps and spam. Staff will get your attention quickly
 











For more accurate welcomes, talk to actual staff
